context_of_use: This use case allows a power user to manage their account securely through registration, login, profile updates, and password resets.
stakeholders_and_interests: system administrator: ensure secure account management
description: This use case enables power users to register, log in, update their profile information, and reset their password to maintain secure account access.
triggering_event: Power user initiates account management actions.
preconditions: Power user has access to the account management interface.
postconditions: Power user successfully registers, logs in, updates profile, or resets password.
System maintains secure access to user accounts.
assumptions: The power user has valid information for registration and password reset.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to register an account.
The system shall allow users to log in securely.
The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
The system shall allow users to reset their password.
main_flow: 1. power user → System prompts for registration details.
2. power user → System processes registration and confirms account creation.
3. power user → System prompts for login credentials.
4. power user → System validates credentials and grants access.
5. power user → System displays profile information.
6. power user → System allows updates to profile information.
7. power user → System confirms profile updates.
8. power user → System prompts for password reset.
9. power user → System processes password reset request and confirms completion.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If registration fails due to invalid information, System prompts power user to correct details.
AF-2 (from Step 4): If login fails due to incorrect credentials, System prompts power user to re-enter credentials.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system is down, System displays an error message indicating unavailability.
EF-2 (from Step 8): If the password reset request fails, System informs power user of the failure and suggests retrying.
